text: Great little spot for a fast weekend breakfast or workday lunch. Very friendly, accommodating and eager to please. And the place is spotless.  The menu situation can be confusing. They seem to have more dishes on offer that you would think -- be sure to ask about specials. I'd recommend a specials board that they can change daily in addition to the chalkboard menu behind the counter.   One little ambience minus: Radio tuned to a Top-40 station is a little intrusive especially when there are commercials. Proprietors should consider hooking up an iPod instead and lowering the volume a little.

Too bad you have to select a star I wouldn't give them any!! Decided to try this place out worst decision ever.. They messed up everything we ordered. 3 phone calls and 2 deliveries later still didn't get what we ordered. Never again!!!

This is my new favorite place to eat. I am very picky when it comes to my meals. The customized my breakfast skillet into a taco salad. The food is amazing. I no longer want to stop at fast food restaurants. Appetite Xpress food gives satisfaction to quick and delicious food.Try it out! You won't be disappointed! P.S wifi and outlets included...
Chicken fried steak burrito. It was delicious. I want to return for more. Especially some of their lunch sandwiches.

We had intended to go to another restaurant in the area that we discovered was closed. So, we thought we would try this new place and were pleasantly surprised. I had the corned-beef hash wrap from the breakfast menu and it was delish! It came with a generous side of fruit. My companions had the bleu cheese bacon burger and the roast beef baguette. My only complaint is that they don't have brewed iced tea. Otherwise, we had no problems and would definitely return.

My co-workers and I tried this little treasure for the first time today. They did not disappoint! We all loved our lunch's. My co-worker was on cloud 9 and wanted to hug the chef because it was so good. Not to mention the service was excellent. We felt cared for, loved and full of delicious food! Can't wait to go back!

3rd time we've eaten here in a week. Its that good. Great food, personal service, and reasonable prices, can't expect more. Special s are just that. Don't miss the soups, they're better than Seinfeld's soup nazi
